br.edu.ifsp.pds.shadowstruggles.data

Class SoundManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • br.edu.ifsp.pds.shadowstruggles.data.SoundManager

  • public class SoundManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Class for encapsulating the sound management within the application. Currently, it supports only the .ogg format.

    • Method Detail

      • setMusic

        public void setMusic(java.lang.String musicName)
        Sets the current background music.
        Parameters:
        musicName - The name of the music to be played, without the extension (example: if a music has "music_1.ogg" as filename, then the expected musicName is "music_1").

      • stop

        public void stop()
        Stops the current background music.

      • playSound

        public void playSound(java.lang.String soundName)
        Plays a sound effect.
        Parameters:
        soundName - The name of the sound effect to be played, without the extension (example: if a sound effect has "effect_1.ogg" as filename, then the expected soundName is "effect_1").
